messages.title: Join the fight against the Dementia Tax
messages.content: Social care should be based on need, not ability to pay. Claire Young pledges to protect the elderly with fairer funding.

messages.title: Thornbury School Funding Crisis
messages.content: #41 teachers at risk in the Thornbury area due to Conservative cuts. Claire Young is fighting to protect our schools.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Protection of school funding and prevention of teacher job losses in the Thornbury area.
Maintaining NHS services and protecting them from cuts under the Conservative government.
Fairer funding for social care, not based on ability to pay.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Only Claire Young can beat the Conservatives here.
